items.content_html: The GNOME To-Do Extension is a lightweight and user-friendly extension designed to help you manage your tasks efficiently. With a minimalistic interface, it allows you to add, modify, and delete tasks effortlessly. No complicated settings, just pure productivity!
items.title: Ryusufe/Todo-In-Gnome: The GNOME To-Do Extension is a lightweight and user-friendly extension designed to help you manage your tasks efficiently. With a minimalistic interface, it allows you to add, modify, and delete tasks effortlessly. No complicated settings, just pure productivity!

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable React form library designed to simplify form handling with built-in validation, flexible field configurations, and dynamic form state management. Ideal for developers looking to streamline form building and enhance user experience in React applications.

Ideal for developers looking to streamline form building and enhance user experience in React applications.

items.content_html: ESign - A fully frontend e-signature solution built with Vite and React. Create, sign, and manage documents effortlessly without a backend. Perfect for self-signing, reusable templates, role-based signing flows, and rapid deployment. The ultimate lightweight alternative to DocuSign/OpenSign!
items.title: Botapproved/ESign-React: ESign - A fully frontend e-signature solution built with Vite and React. Create, sign, and manage documents effortlessly without a backend. Perfect for self-signing, reusable templates, role-based signing flows, and rapid deployment. The ultimate lightweight alternative to DocuSign/OpenSign!
